title: Rithi Sen FC
text:
Rithi Sen FC () is a <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> club from <a href="Kampong%20Chhnang%20%28city%29">Kampong Chhnang</a>, Cambodia. This Club won Kor 1 semi-professional  competition in 2007. Rithi Sen used to participate in <a href="2011%20Cambodian%20League%20">2011 Cambodian League </a>, but finished bottom of the table after they played 18 matches winless, draw 2 lose 16 matches. After absent for almost 10 years after relegated, in 2020 Rithi Sen came back and make competition in <a href="Cambodian%20Second%C2%A0%20League">Cambodian Second  League</a>.
History.
Formed in 2005, Rithi Sen FC had just 20 players and sponsored by Oknha Rous Sovan Veasna. The club won Kor 1 Cup in 2007 and participated in 2011 C League. However, they failed to win a single match, draw 2, lose 16 matches, and relegated. Since then, the club inactive for almost 10 years and came back in <a href="2020%20Cambodian%20Second%20League">2020 Cambodian Second League</a>.
